snippet: The actor and his partner, Tamara Malkin-Stuart, live in a Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn, townhouse.
abstract: Actor and director Nick Sandow loves his 19th-century Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn townhouse, where he reads scripts in the attic, bathes in a freestanding tub and watches Italian movies with his wife.
lead_paragraph: The actor and his partner, Tamara Malkin-Stuart, live in a Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn, townhouse.

headline.main: Nick Sandow, of ‘Orange Is the New Black,’ at Home
